data.quote: I want to stay healthy, keep fit, eat well, keep a low profile and be a good dad.
data.author: Frank Bruno

data.quote: One time, on Marine One, the president asked me my opinion. I had a flashback to being at the kitchen table with my dad. That dominant male figure set me up for being confident to express myself with precision and persuasion.
data.author: Dana Perino

data.quote: I do remember vividly sometime after puberty when I'd answer the phone at home and the callers began to say, 'Hi, Bill!' That's when I knew Dad and I had the same voice.
data.author: Willie Geist

data.quote: The biggest lesson I learned from my dad is to support children even if they're doing something that is unorthodox.
data.author: Tony Hawk

data.quote: The worst advice I ever received from my dad was to play by the book.
data.author: Dimebag Darrell

data.quote: Humans have voids, and you need things to fill voids... I didn't have a dad to fill that male model void, so when I heard Eminem or freaking seen Dave Chapelle, that's what I gravitated to.
data.author: Tyler, The Creator

data.quote: My dad grew up in Banbridge, Northern Ireland, desperate to get to London. I grew up in London, so I don't know what it's like to yearn for the big city from a small town.
data.author: Daniel Radcliffe

data.quote: Sons have always a rebellious wish to be disillusioned by that which charmed their fathers.
data.author: Aldous Huxley

data.quote: I stopped loving my father a long time ago. What remained was the slavery to a pattern.
data.author: Anais Nin

data.quote: I am lucky to have had an attentive, curious and loving dad and heart-smart, down-to-earth, gifted mother. They changed the outlooks of their own lives and have never forgotten the people and organizations that helped them dream bigger than their circumstances should have allowed.
data.author: Jennifer Garner

data.quote: My dad liked to boil a squirrel head and suck the brains out the nose. Smaller than a chicken, bigger than a rat.
data.author: Beth Ditto

data.quote: Ah, my dad's whistle. On holidays when I was a kid, we would all be off in the rock pools along the beach. When it came time to go, we'd hear the whistle and we'd all come running. Like dogs!
data.author: Kate Winslet

data.quote: I will always do what I can to help others, but when I retire, I want to be a dad and a husband. I want a house and a dog in the yard. I want to have barbecues.
data.author: J. J. Watt

data.quote: I didn't know my dad for a long time. My dad was on drugs and my dad was at the VA Hospital, my dad was off in his own world selling drugs or using them or there would be crack heads in the house or whatever it would be.
data.author: Shia LaBeouf

data.quote: I have to remind my dad, 'Journalists - no matter how many cigars they smoke with you - are not your friends, so don't talk to them.'
data.author: Cameron Diaz

data.quote: My dad said to me growing up: 'When all is said and done, if you can count all your true friends on one hand, you're a lucky man.'
data.author: Josh Charles

data.quote: I was into the Mets because my Dad worked at IBM where he got free Mets tickets, so I was into the Mets... then I got to 'Saturday Night Live' where my boss has unbelievable N.Y. Yankees tickets, so he invites us to the games. I'm going to all the games, so I might as well root for the team I'm gonna go sit with.
data.author: Jimmy Fallon

data.quote: My dad had an aunt at the turn of the century who died from diabetes, but she was the closest affected relative in my family.
data.author: Bobby Clarke

data.quote: My mum was very conscious about fashion, and my dad was born into the tailoring tradition, so fashion has always been my life, although now, really, I wear the same thing - just in different weights - light and heavy cashmere in winter and cotton in summer. And jeans.
data.author: Domenico Dolce

data.quote: I always joke that my kids' favorite holiday is Father's Day. They love the way I celebrate the occasion by writing each of them a thank-you letter and a generous check. It's my way of letting them know how much I appreciate the great pleasure and privilege of being their dad.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: My family always helped me. I had people around me who always pushed me to be the best: my dad, my mum. My dad used to play and coach as well. But I wasn't born with shiny things.
data.author: Paul Pogba

data.quote: My dad has been a big influence on me, because he's always had his own business. He really taught me business sense and how to be a focused individual, but also how to have fun and make everyone around you have fun.
data.author: Wiz Khalifa

data.quote: On rare occasions, Dad used to reminisce about when he met Eisenhower and how Churchill would pop in, in the late hours of the evening or night, carrying a cigar, when he'd obviously had a good dinner.
data.author: Ridley Scott

data.quote: There's sometimes a weird benefit to having an alcoholic, violent father. He really motivated me in that I never wanted to be anything like him.
data.author: Dean Koontz

data.quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
data.author: Enid Bagnold

data.quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back.
data.author: Imelda Marcos

data.quote: My father wants me to be like my brother, but I can't be.
data.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

data.quote: Babies don't need fathers, but mothers do. Someone who is taking care of a baby needs to be taken care of.
data.author: Amy Heckerling

data.quote: I kept my babies fed. I could have dumped them, but I didn't. I decided that whatever trip I was on, they were going with me. You're looking at a real daddy.
data.author: Barry White

data.quote: I was punished for blowing the whistle on my father's lifestyle.
data.author: Tatum O'Neal

data.quote: When I was 18, I thought my father was pretty dumb. After a while when I got to be 21, I was amazed to find out how much he'd learned in three years.
data.author: Frank Butler

data.quote: Since I was a boy, from this house, I was out rescuing crocodiles and snakes. My mum and dad were very passionate about that and, I was lucky enough to go along.
data.author: Steve Irwin

data.quote: Tiffany is very proud to have the last name and she's proud of her dad.
data.author: Marla Maples

data.quote: You know not having my real dad around and having a step dad made me want to be a great dad. So now I have been one for 9 years. And now 3 daughters. So, that is what I am - a dad, first and foremost, before anything else. It's just something that comes natural now.
data.author: Tim McGraw

data.quote: I never saw any of my dad's stories. My mother said he had piles and piles of manuscripts.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: My dad saw my husband's boss at a conference, and he said to stop paying my husband until we produce children.
data.author: Jenna Bush

data.quote: I said, 'Ooh, Dad, I want the yellow ones.' He said, 'Where?' I said, 'Right there, Dad. I want the yellow ones.' Everybody goes, 'Those are green'. That's how I knew I was colorblind.
data.author: Michael Rosenbaum

data.quote: My dad never told me that when you audition, you might not get the role. He wanted to wait until my first disappointment to tell me.
data.author: Haley Joel Osment

data.quote: I would have to say the person with whom I am most in love is definitely my son, Everly Bear. Although I'm his dad, I'm also his friend.
data.author: Anthony Kiedis

data.quote: My mother wanted to name me Jackie or Jacqueline but she got to name my sister and my brother, so my dad and my brother insisted on naming me. And they were big fans of 'The Little Mermaid.'
data.author: Ariel Winter

data.quote: My dad's a scratch golfer and I've got the knack of seeing something and then replicating it. I saw my dad swing a club and I worked out how to do the same thing. My backswing and follow-through have been basically the same since I was two.
data.author: Rory McIlroy

data.quote: Now I meditate twice a day for half an hour. In meditation, I can let go of everything. I'm not Hugh Jackman. I'm not a dad. I'm not a husband. I'm just dipping into that powerful source that creates everything. I take a little bath in it.
data.author: Hugh Jackman

data.quote: If anybody had a reason to become a delinquent, to become a criminal, to be angry at the man, to be angry at the white man, to be angry at America, it's my dad, but he did not feel that way at all.
data.author: Larry Elder

data.quote: During the Depression, my dad made radios to sell to make extra money. Nobody had any money to buy the radios, so he would trade them for dogs. He built kennels in the backyard, and he cared for the dogs.
data.author: Betty White

data.quote: My mum was raised Jewish, my dad is very scientifically minded, and my school was vaguely Christian. We sang hymns in school. I liked the hymns bit, but apart from that, I can take it or leave it. So I had lots of different influences when I was younger.
data.author: Ben Barnes

data.quote: Paul McCartney had a baby when he was 61; Rod Stewart was 66; Rupert Murdoch was a stunning 72. Not only does that mean they'll have less stamina than the average dad, that means they'll, well, check out a lot sooner too.
data.author: Jeffrey Kluger

data.quote: My mother played the piano and my father the violin, I can remember my dad teaching me how to waltz; I had my feet on his, my mother playing the piano, and my husband will tell you the lessons weren't very successful.
data.author: Quentin Bryce

data.quote: You draw the best things from your parents and family. You're going to pick up some of the bad things as well - there's a temper that runs through my dad's side of the family that I'm not especially keen on picking up a giant block of.
data.author: Mark Ronson

data.quote: My dad's quite a conservative person, and he brought me up to be very questioning of the commercial world. He looked down on pop culture. I definitely got the impression that pop was evil and that Britney Spears was evil.
data.author: Marina and the Diamonds

data.quote: My mum and dad have always enjoyed life, and it's something that's been instilled in me. I wake up in a good mood most mornings.
data.author: Rafe Spall

data.quote: My mother was a very wonderful woman. When she and my dad divorced, she moved to California and worked two jobs in the cannery at night and as a waitress during the day. But she saved enough money to establish a restaurant.
data.author: Dolores Huerta

data.quote: One of my dad's friends from the music industry came over to our house one time and heard me sing, and he said, 'She should audition for this role I have!' So I did! It was a movie called 'The Gospel,' which I did when I was five. That was when I was like, 'I want to do this acting thing!'
data.author: China Anne McClain

data.quote: My dad was an assembly line worker at AC Spark Plug, which was a division of General Motors, and his job was to build and then inspect the little spark plugs as they came off the line.
data.author: Michael Moore

data.quote: I love my dad; I'm a daddy's girl, all the way.
data.author: Molly Quinn

data.quote: God bless Dad, he came to every one of my shows. I was bad, and I had horrible stage fright. My dad was so relieved - he'd say, 'You were terrible; this kid is not going to be an actor.' Finally, I did a play and he said, 'Son - you were really good.'
data.author: Kirk Douglas

data.quote: I remember my dad asking me one time, and it's something that has always stuck with me: 'Why not you, Russ?' You know, why not me? Why not me in the Super Bowl?
data.author: Russell Wilson

data.quote: I used to play chess when I was a kid and participate in national-level tournaments with the geekiest guys. This one time, I was losing terribly, so I batted my eyelashes and flirted as I asked for a draw. My dad just couldn't believe it. He thought, 'What have I created, a floozy?' But it worked!
data.author: Jordana Spiro

data.quote: My dad's cooking was magic in the kitchen. But eventually over the years, his personality changed and his ability to remember recipes failed. He became paranoid and thought people were stealing from him, when often he was just misplacing things.
data.author: Tess Gerritsen

data.quote: Because my dad's Chinese-American, and they're very concrete, he said, 'There's no money to be made in literature.' So he told me to go into the sciences. And I was a good girl. And I did what Daddy said. And that's how I ended up being a doctor. But you know, you just can't stamp out that desire to tell stories.
data.author: Tess Gerritsen

data.quote: I recall my dad saying about me once that the only time he'd ever heard me say 'never' was when I was asked if I'd had enough.
data.author: Bob Diamond

data.quote: My dad always taught me to never be satisfied: to want more and know that what is done is done. That was his way of seeing the game. You've done it, now move on. People might say, 'Well, when can you enjoy it?' But it worked for me because, in the game, you need to be on your toes.
data.author: Thierry Henry

data.quote: I was obsessed with clowns. My dad had to get rid of them. I thought there were clowns under my bed for years.
data.author: Haley Bennett

data.quote: I had one of the most outdoorsy childhoods you could imagine. I basically lived in the woods until I was 13. My dad and I built a huge treehouse in our backyard in Chesterfield, about 30 feet in the air. And we'd vacation on an island in Michigan, where I hunted a deer that we ate.
data.author: Gabriel Basso

data.quote: Wear what you want to wear. Do what you want to do. Be who you are. Pick out your own clothes. Be a man. And if that's too much to ask, as it almost always is for me, think of someone you consider to be a man and pretend to be like him. I pretend to be like my dad.
data.author: Lyle Lovett

data.quote: I've seen fathers criticizing their sons the moment a game's over. Not my dad. It doesn't matter if I threw an interception or a Hail Mary, he always says, 'Good job, son, I'm proud of you.' Then he shakes my hand and gives me a hug. Every time.
data.author: Ben Roethlisberger

data.quote: My dad set a clear model for me for what manhood was all about.
data.author: Cory Booker

data.quote: M dad was a boxer, so he had this fierce, physical presence.
data.author: Anthony Browne

data.quote: I learned from my dad that change and experimentation are constants and important. You have to keep trying new things.
data.author: S. Robson Walton

data.quote: I was looking for the meaning of life when I was in college. And my deal with my dad was as long as I was taking a full course load, then he would pay. And the times that I wasn't taking a full course load, then I was off the dole and I was working.
data.author: John Mackey

data.quote: I've got the best parents you could ever ask for. My parents are from New Jersey, and they met in Vermont in college. My Dad grew up listening to heavy, psychedelic music. He's my biggest fan.
data.author: King Tuff

data.quote: Every year, I give my dad an advance copy of my latest book. He reads it over the next several nights and says something incredibly supportive. Then he clears his throat nervously and changes the subject.
data.author: Chelsea Cain

data.quote: I promised my dad before he passed away that I would take care of the family.
data.author: Luis Coronel

data.quote: One day we were sitting in our little classroom in the middle of Australia Zoo, and Dad bursts in and says, 'OK, today we're going to go climb a mountain,' - the Glass House Mountains are about 20 minutes away - so we packed up all our math work and ran out the door and climbed Mount Tibrogargan.
data.author: Bindi Irwin

data.quote: There isn't a dude outside my dad who had greater influence on my life.
data.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

data.quote: Had my dad not been short and fat and balding, there's no doubt his career would have been very different. But he could do lots of stuff and made a very good career out of it. He had an incredible work ethic because he lost his father when he was very young, and the family had to pull together.
data.author: Rory Kinnear

data.quote: If my dad was alive, I wouldn't have gone to boarding school, and I wouldn't have had the success I've had.
data.author: Jason Day

data.quote: I come from a very, very small town. There were no other actors around. I never met any actors. A lot of those times when I'd be out in the sheds with my dad, I'd step outside, and there's just nothing out there but thousands of acres, forty thousand sheep, and miles of nothing. And so my mind would just wonder about what else was out there.
data.author: Jason Clarke

data.quote: I don't think it ever occurred to me that I wouldn't be an entrepreneur. My dad became a real estate developer, and that work is usually project-based. You attract investors for a project with a certain life cycle, and then you move on to the next thing. It's almost like being a serial entrepreneur, so I had that as an example.
data.author: Stewart Butterfield

data.quote: I do have an occasional temper - I sort of inherited my dad's short fuse.
data.author: Princess Eugenie of York

data.quote: I never grew up on Jodeci. I never grew up on things like that 'cause my dad was a preacher, and he kind of kept us away from music like that.
data.author: Tory Lanez

data.quote: I'm definitely the super-cool dad.
data.author: Ty Dolla Sign

data.quote: When you're younger, you're trying to understand and make sense of what your parents are trying to instill in you, which is ultimately life experience. I remember being 17 and my dad trying to teach me the importance of responsibility.
data.author: Jovan Adepo

data.quote: I went through a brief phase when I thought of other career options: being an air hostess and even a psychologist. But eventually, my destiny led me to acting. Moreover, my dad being an actor, I have grown up in a very filmi environment. I was encouraged to watch films since I was a child.
data.author: Shraddha Kapoor

data.quote: I've got a love affair with Harley-Davidson. One of my earliest photos with my dad is of him holding me as a baby on his bike.
data.author: Jeffrey Dean Morgan

data.quote: At my house, it's an, 'If dad says it, you can say it' kind of deal, so a lot of my slang words come off very childish at this point in my career.
data.author: A.J. Styles

data.quote: I have carried the burden of my dad's image since day one. They never see me as just another guy trying to make his career in the film industry. I am always 'Megastar' Chiranjeevi's son first, and Ram Charan only later.
data.author: Ram Charan

data.quote: My dad was always playing music. Not, like, playing music but listening to music.
data.author: Post Malone

data.quote: The most ironic thing is my grandfather has his masters in music composition; he was a jazz composer. My dad was a musician, too. He played more, like, soul music.
data.author: Travis Scott

data.quote: I was homeless for about 8 months, I refused to live with my dad or anyone for that matter. So I stayed somewhere that had no hot water, ever, no heat, I told myself I have to be strong and get through it on my own.
data.author: Eric West

data.quote: I was built up from my dad more than anyone else.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: My dad farmed, my granddad was a farmer. I wanted to be a farmer.
data.author: Sam Brownback

data.quote: My dad had been shortstop when he was in college, and you know, when you're a kid, you want to be just like your dad.
data.author: Derek Jeter

data.quote: My dad would always say, 'What can you do to make the world a better place?' Well, I can make people laugh.
data.author: Jon Lovitz

data.quote: My father came from a very poor background, but I was very fortunate in the sense that we were never in need. My dad was determined to make sure that we didn't want for things. He wanted to give us more opportunity than he had, a better shot at a better life.
data.author: Brad Pitt

data.quote: I remember when I was younger. Dad's agent came round, and I asked if she would represent me. She didn't represent children at the time, but I wouldn't let her leave the house until she agreed. I've always been quite headstrong.
data.author: Eleanor Tomlinson

data.quote: You can't be two people in your brain, one rock dude and a dad - there's something in the middle of them, and that's really what you are and that's going to make you the best dad - not when you try to be one or the other.
data.author: Gerard Way

data.quote: Go on daddy-daughter dates and father-and-sons' outings with your children. As a family, go on campouts and picnics, to ball games and recitals, to school programs, and so forth. Having Dad there makes all the difference.
data.author: Ezra Taft Benson

data.quote: I was probably a terrible husband, but I pride myself on being a good dad.
data.author: Dwyane Wade

data.quote: 'The Simpsons' was about children and married parents; 'Futurama' is about people in between; they're growing up and haven't settled down. Every other cartoon show seemed to be, you know, dumb dad, bratty kids.
data.author: Matt Groening

data.quote: My dad was a composer and a musician, but he never finished high school. His formal education was rather minimal from the standards of today's college graduates and Ph.D.'s, but he had a deep interest in questions of science and questions of the universe.
data.author: Brian Greene

data.quote: My dad gave me the gene to enjoy cooking, and to enjoy consuming good food and wine.
data.author: Danny Meyer

data.quote: I thank my dad for leaving me such a wonderful, wonderful heritage.
data.author: Natalie Cole

data.quote: I have a massive Samoan family. And the Samoan culture has always played a massive part of my life. I've got hundreds of family on my dad's side that live in Samoa and in New Zealand. I've just been surrounded by the culture ever since I was a kid.
data.author: KJ Apa

data.quote: Dad was an outstanding leader. He'd bring in top thinkers from a wide array of fields - how to fix the Detroit schools, for example. I watched him in these meetings. He listened and probed.
data.author: Mitt Romney

data.quote: When my dad founded our church, he used either a globe or a map of the world behind him. It was symbolic of what Christ said: to go forth and preach hope to the world. We believe in the cross, but we just continued with the globe.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: My dad loves what I do and I support my parents financially because they didn't have a job that gave them a pension.
data.author: Marilyn Manson

data.quote: My dad never graduated high school. He was a printing salesman. We lived in a two-bedroom, one-bath house in St. Louis Park, Minnesota. We weren't rich - but we felt secure.
data.author: Al Franken

data.quote: OK, I have a nickname. My family calls me 'Trey' because I'm William the third. My dad has the same name, which is always confusing because my dad is well known, and I'm also known.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: Me and my dad are the biggest promoters of an estate tax in the US. It's not a popular position.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: People are always coming up to me and saying, 'I heard your dad's speech, and it's really great.' And they'll mention some place I didn't even know my dad was going to.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: The only advantage to being a middle-aged man is that when you put on a jacket and tie, you're the Scary Dad. Never mind that no one has had an actually scary dad since 1966. The visceral fear remains.
data.author: P. J. O'Rourke

data.quote: My dad had been born in Mexico and his family had to leave during the Mexican revolution.
data.author: Mitt Romney

data.quote: Because my dad abused me, I was determined to never let a man tell me what to do. God clearly showed me that I needed to be a submissive wife if I wanted to be effective in ministry. The truth is, if we don't learn to submit to authority, we won't ever learn to submit to God.
data.author: Joyce Meyer

data.quote: My Dad used to tell us: 'En este pais, ustedes van a poder lograr todas las cosas que nosotros no pudimos' 'In this country, you will be able to accomplish all the things we never could.'
data.author: Marco Rubio

data.quote: I remember one parent-teacher conference at the lower school, and Barack went, and there were SWAT guys on top of the roof of the school. And Malia was like, 'Dad, really? Really? Do they really have to be up there?' And it's like, yeah, honey, they do.
data.author: Michelle Obama

data.quote: My dad was fiscally conservative, and I was influenced by that. He didn't believe in spending more than you had because it gets you into trouble.
data.author: Clint Eastwood

data.quote: My dad was a big admirer of Sergeant York stories from the First World War.
data.author: Clint Eastwood

data.quote: Ask anyone on Social Security if their check comes on time every month. Like clockwork. And it comes through the so-called dilapidated U.S. mail. My dad's check literally will come on the same day every month. The government has been quite good and efficient at creating a number of systems.
data.author: Michael Moore

data.quote: I wanted to be a skinny little ballerina but I was a voluptuous little Italian girl whose dad had meatballs on the table every night.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: I love my daddy. My daddy's everything. I hope I can find a man that will treat me as good as my dad.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: Making your dad happy is - especially for an Italian Catholic girl, I'll tell you - it feels really good.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: I made a decision when my father passed away that I was going to be who God made me to be and not try to preach like my father.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: My dad had a church of 90 people when I was born. It was just, over the years it continued to grow.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: I didn't try to copy my dad or fit into the pressure or the mold that everybody tried to make me fit into.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: My dad seemed comfortable with his decision to be a 'have-not,' but I knew that I wasn't.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: In 1997, in Rich Dad, Poor Dad, I stated, 'Your home is not an asset.' Real estate agents sent me hate mail.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: When my book 'Rich Dad's Prophecy' was released in 2002, most financial newspapers and magazines trashed it because I discussed a looming stock market crash.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: My rich dad believed we should all learn to take care of ourselves.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: I think my dad has helped me tremendously.
data.author: Rand Paul

data.quote: My dad was one of only four congressmen who supported Reagan.
data.author: Rand Paul

data.quote: My dad got a job in a factory in Philadelphia, so I was raised in Germantown in a sort of a barracks for soldiers. They had housing for temporary housing. And then my parents saved money and bought a little house in South Jersey, built on a swamp.
data.author: Patti Smith

data.quote: Working with my dad was such a gas. We approached the work in a similar way. We only made two films together when I was an adult, Tucker, and Blown Away, but it was so much fun to play with your parent like that.
data.author: Jeff Bridges

data.quote: The first thing that pops into my mind when it comes to playing cowboys is my father, Lloyd Bridges. When I was a little kid, I loved to dress up like a cowboy - put on the boots, hat, and walk around. He was in a lot of westerns, and my dad loved to ride.
data.author: Jeff Bridges

data.quote: My dad was very much a struggling actor and spent more of his life as a postman, as a member of a tarmac firm, as a van driver.
data.author: Kate Winslet

data.quote: Mum and Dad were very much friends and up for life. There was no anxiety for anything when I was growing up they just taught me to be me.
data.author: Kate Winslet

data.quote: My dad would give me $10, which is a lot of money when you're 9, to sing at church, on tables at restaurants, at family functions, just about anywhere.
data.author: Katy Perry

data.quote: My mother is very emotional as well, but my dad is more of the guts of the family. He was the main preacher, so he kind of had this little Pentecostal flair, but they are born-again.
data.author: Katy Perry

data.quote: My dad makes food with very few delicate flavours.
data.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

data.quote: Dad likes my food, but he probably thinks it's too busy. He is a wonderful cook but only uses three ingredients. My mum rips out my articles and makes my recipes.
data.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

data.quote: My dad was never married. He was kind of a rolling stone. But he was never disrespectful. At the same time, even though he had women in his life when I was a kid, there wasn't any consistency.
data.author: Kevin Hart

data.quote: My dad came from Cuba when he was a teenager not speaking English. And I grew up here speaking Spanglish. That's the world in which I grew up, and that's a world in which a lot of second generation immigrants find themselves.
data.author: Ted Cruz

data.quote: My dad grew up with an avocado tree in his backyard. My entire family, my wife and daughters, they love avocado. I may well be allergic. It makes me physically sick.
data.author: Ted Cruz

data.quote: This is going to sound horrible, but I don't even know how much I make in a year. It must be, you know, a couple of million dollars, a few million. I know it's more money than my dad, a jail guard, made in his lifetime; more money than I'll ever need.
data.author: Penn Jillette

data.quote: I'm very at ease, and I like it. I never thought I would be such a family-oriented guy; I didn't think that was part of my makeup. But somebody said that as you get older you become the person you always should have been, and I feel that's happening to me. I'm rather surprised at who I am, because I'm actually like my dad!
data.author: David Bowie

data.quote: And I saw the sax line-up that he had behind him and I thought, I'm going to learn the saxophone. When I grow up, I'm going to play in his band. So I sort of persuaded my dad to get me a kind of a plastic saxophone on the hire purchase plan.
data.author: David Bowie

data.quote: My dad would go to work every day and write in a room full of funny people. He enjoyed it. I know great writers who find the process agonising but to me, writing has always been sheer joy.
data.author: Joss Whedon

data.quote: I have a son, but I've never had a daughter. I have a sister, and my sister had a fairly tempestuous relationship with my dad when she was young, and that was gripping and sometimes upsetting.
data.author: Howard Jacobson

data.quote: You don't want your children to look at you like you are anything special other than their dad.
data.author: Martin Freeman

data.quote: I wasn't like a Fifties dad.
data.author: Martin Freeman

data.quote: People are so used to seeing John Goodman as a lovable dad or the quirky characters he played in the Coen Brothers films.
data.author: James Wan

data.quote: People are so used to seeing John Goodman as a loveable dad or the quirky characters he played in the Coen Brothers films.
data.author: James Wan

data.quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
data.author: Bertrand Russell

data.quote: The fundamental defect of fathers, in our competitive society, is that they want their children to be a credit to them.
data.author: Bertrand Russell

data.quote: I drove my mum and dad mad.
data.author: Nicola Sturgeon

data.quote: My dad's been responsible for a lot of my issues.
data.author: Steven Spielberg

data.quote: I get that same queasy, nervous, thrilling feeling every time I go to work. That's never worn off since I was 12 years-old with my dad's 8-millimeter movie camera.
data.author: Steven Spielberg

data.quote: My dad took me to my first movie. It was 'The Greatest Show on Earth' in 1952, a movie of such scale it was actually a traumatic experience.
data.author: Steven Spielberg

data.quote: I missed my dad a lot growing up, even though we were together as a family. My dad was really a workaholic. And he was always working.
data.author: Steven Spielberg

data.quote: Dad entered the Second World War like any other man, trying to do the right thing.
data.author: Ridley Scott

data.quote: I deal with my sons like young men. If they have a problem with something, they come to me. I am the type of dad that will drop everything I am doing for them, and always tell them to talk to me about it.
data.author: Tracy Morgan

data.quote: My father was the role model I looked up to. My dad was an entertainer, too. I patterned my life after him. He wanted me to do better than he did. He never sold a record in his life, but to me, he was still a rock star.
data.author: Tracy Morgan

data.quote: My dad was good with actions.
data.author: William Shatner

data.quote: My dad died of a stroke.
data.author: William Shatner

data.quote: Attraction doesn't stop when a child is born. It's the opposite. Being a mum and dad makes you even sexier.
data.author: Orlando Bloom

data.quote: Think about finding out when you're 13 that your dad is not your dad. It's like, okay, take it on the chin and keep going. No choice, really.
data.author: Orlando Bloom

data.quote: I was in the bath at the time, and my dad came running in and said, 'Guess who they want to play Harry Potter!?' and I started to cry. It was probably the best moment of my life.
data.author: Daniel Radcliffe

data.quote: My dad's got a brilliant eye for scripts 'cos he's a literary agent. He and my agent read a load of scripts and filter them.
data.author: Daniel Radcliffe

data.quote: When I was 13, I opened my own business called The Awesome Pretzel Company, and my dad helped me build a pretzel cart.
data.author: Guy Fieri

data.quote: I think my dad is highly gender-neutral. If he doesn't like someone, he'll articulate that, and I think it's also part of what resonates about him. He'll say what he's thinking.

data.quote: It was my dad's idea to change my name from Sahatciu to Ora. He said it would be easier to pronounce.

data.quote: My mum and my dad are the sweetest couple.
data.author: Rita Ora

data.quote: My dad wanted me to go down a more academic route. He is very much about sticking to the rule book and sticking to the blueprint of a successful career.
data.author: Rita Ora

data.quote: I love eating at my dad's pub, the Queens Arms in Kilburn. It does a traditional Albanian spinach pie.
data.author: Rita Ora

data.quote: My dad took on every job he could get. He worked like mad. But then, at some point, he had saved up enough to open his first pub.
data.author: Rita Ora

data.quote: I've been going to Bicester Village since I was young. My mum and dad really loved that place, and I always used to stock up on clothes. I love the fact that it supports great British designers.
data.author: Rita Ora

data.quote: Now my dad is with me, traveling with me and a big part of this whole thing is I like to mix it up a little bit, you know. Who gets to take their father on a private jet across the country and stay in first class hotels? So we're enjoying it, but I'd stop if it's not possible.
data.author: Shia LaBeouf

data.quote: I don't know, I just want to be happy. I could be in a hole somewhere. Or I could completely lose it and be some hippy living in the woods with my dad.
data.author: Shia LaBeouf

data.quote: I'm not great at dealing with death, I have to say. I find death very hard: my mum, my dad, Sid Vicious. I'm not a monster; I feel it and it scares me. One death at a time, please, is all my heart will bear.
data.author: John Lydon

data.quote: I truly think comedy is - being funny is DNA. My dad was a doctor, a wonderful doctor, and people still come up to me today, 'Your father helped my mother die.' You know what I'm saying? He made her laugh 'til she died. My father was always very funny.
data.author: Joan Rivers

data.quote: I stayed in Baghdad every summer until I was 14. My dad's sister is still there, but many of my relatives have managed to get out. People forget that there are still people there who are not radicalized in any particular direction, trying to live normal lives in a very difficult situation.
data.author: Andy Serkis

data.quote: My mother had very humble beginnings - to put it mildly. Her dad built their home out of timber that he cut down on their land. No heat, no air-conditioning - 'no foolishness,' as he would call it.
data.author: Blake Lively

data.quote: My dad was an English professor.
data.author: Blake Lively

data.quote: Great dad. Yeah, he would ask me for money on birthdays and, you know, inappropriate times. And I just wrote him off like, 'You're not a father.' I just learned you cannot emotionally invest in people who are not attainable.
data.author: Drew Barrymore

data.quote: I used to do bell ringing in Benenden church. It was really good fun, actually. My best friend's dad was the local vicar, and so it was expected as her best friend that I would go to church every Sunday with her.
data.author: Jo Brand

data.quote: My dad's a very sensitive man, but as the archetypal rebellious teenager, I didn't realise that.
data.author: Jo Brand

data.quote: My mum is bright, ambitious, well read, political and very bolshie: when my dad was conscripted into the Army and posted to Libya, she convinced some general to let her go with him. I don't know how she managed it.
data.author: Jo Brand

data.quote: It wasn't like I was self-motivated. My dad started me. It was his dream before it was mine.
data.author: Venus Williams

data.quote: I'm always on the court with my dad.
data.author: Venus Williams

data.quote: My dad loves to eat, and he loves everything I make!
data.author: Venus Williams

data.quote: My views about God come from my dad. Dad told me that he believed Nature, which to him included humankind, to be so beautiful, so magnificent, that there had to be something behind it all.
data.author: Al Franken

data.quote: My parents didn't make a lot of money. My dad was not a high school graduate - he didn't have a career as such he was a printing salesman essentially for most of his working life.
data.author: Al Franken

data.quote: My dad loved comedians, especially George Jessel, and he loved Henny Youngman and Buddy Hackett.
data.author: Al Franken

data.quote: My dad was a terrible businessman.
data.author: Al Franken

data.quote: My dad is an attorney. I've always been interested in it. My sons are probably going to law school.
data.author: Rob Lowe

data.quote: A kid is something precious, and you want to protect it and keep it fun. I'm not a dad, but I've seen people and how they behave with their kids.
data.author: Jason Statham

data.quote: When I was growing up, my dad didn't have weights, so he made himself a weight bench. Instead of a hand-me-down jacket, it was a hand-me-down weight bench.
data.author: Jason Statham

data.quote: The physical DNA has always been part of our family. My dad was a good boxer and gymnast; my mum is a ballroom dancer, and my brother does martial arts.
data.author: Jason Statham

data.quote: I remember tap-dancing and singing in front of the TV when I was a kid, telling my dad to stop watching Ed Sullivan or Milton Berle and watch me.
data.author: Andie MacDowell

data.quote: In my heart, I'm just a kid from the council houses. I can remember the old cottage and my dad coming round with the tin bath. I'm not a rich man.
data.author: Terry Pratchett

data.quote: Mickey Rourke's character in 'The Wrestler' - that was my dad, that was my uncles, that was so many members of my family. It was the only thing they knew. And then they would end up wrestling for a hundred bucks, go to autograph signings for two hundred bucks.
data.author: Dwayne Johnson

data.quote: When I was a kid at four years old, that's when I started amateur wrestling with my dad and family. And when that's instilled in you, it never goes away.
data.author: Dwayne Johnson

data.quote: I had a very strict upbringing with my dad and was very close to my mum, who was extremely loving.
data.author: Tori Amos

data.quote: I love my dad. There is no doubt about that. He is a wonderful man and a good person. Like many father/son relationships, we have our struggles, our misunderstandings, and our miscommunications. We are very different people, but also very similar at the same time.

data.quote: I would say the dumbest thing I have heard is that my dad isn't my real dad.

data.quote: If your dad died before you were born, yeah, it hurts - but it's not like you had a connection with something that was real. data.author: Jay-Z

data.quote: My dad was president of the volunteer fire department, which was within walking distance to our house. I spent several days of each week there with him - any time the whistle blew, he went. It was truly inspiring to watch him lead that way.

data.quote: My dad was a preacher.
data.author: Matthew Desmond

data.quote: My dad always used to encourage me to dress weird.
data.author: Charli XCX

data.quote: My career plan at this point is 'Ice Age 5' through '10,' and even '12,' and 'Spider Man' - you know, basically I'd be Emma Stone's dad for the rest of my career. I really don't have any problem doing that.
data.author: Denis Leary

data.author: Chris Pine

data.quote: I think my dad is the only Arabic descendent who is an unsuccessful businessman.
data.author: Shakira

data.quote: At the age of eight, I discovered that I could write songs. My dad used to take them to the notary and register them so that nobody could steal them from me.
data.author: Shakira

data.quote: The thing is, my dad's always been more of a bookworm; he was interested in more intellectual pursuits, but nobody can escape the passion that football stirs.
data.author: Shakira

data.quote: I adore my dad. He's a 78-year-old man and my inspiration.
data.author: Shakira

data.quote: When I was a boy, my own dad told me in a smiling and wistful way that it's a wise man that knows his own father.

data.quote: My dad and I are best friends. He's pretty much responsible for the way I turned out. He would provide a little artistic inspiration here and there in the form of a guitar, stuff like that.

data.quote: My dad is an egomaniac.
data.author: Sia

data.quote: What I think is remarkable about my mum and dad is they had no interest in films, really. None.

data.author: Peter Jackson

data.quote: My dad goes through war novels like I go through boxes of Cinnamon Toast Crunch.

data.quote: If you're a girl, you're always Daddy's little girl. You're vulnerable, no matter how worldly or sophisticated or strong you'd become along the way. My dad Lionel let me know how proud he was, even as he kept me from being too big for my britches.

data.quote: Our public portrayal of fathers has shifted during my life. TV fathers have 'evolved' from real people like Sheriff Andy Taylor, Beaver's dad Ward Cleaver and Heathcliff 'Cliff' Huxtable, to cartoon dads like Homer Simpson and Seth MacFarlane's caricatures in 'American Dad!' and 'Family Guy.'
data.author: Donna Brazile

data.quote: I have to say that my dad's face is very malleable. He's barely got any cartilage in his face. I think I maybe inherited that Play-Doh-like physicality from him.

data.quote: When I was 13, I had my first job with my dad carrying shingles up to the roof. And then I got a job washing dishes at a restaurant. And then I got a job in a grocery store deli. And then I got a job in a factory sweeping Cheerio dust off the ground.

data.quote: My dad was young; he went to work. But he'd been to war. He'd seen some of the world. It wasn't like he was going to be an extensive traveler or something. It didn't seem to be in his nature or in the nature of his parents or many of the folks in my family, really.
data.author: Bruce Springsteen

data.quote: I think I created my particular stage persona out of my dad's life, and perhaps I even built it to suit him to some degree.
data.author: Bruce Springsteen

data.quote: Once, I was coming back from school, and there was this guy who was eve-teasing me and my friend. I had a Milton water bottle that I flung it at his face. data.quote: My dad taught me to never be pigeonholed to really allow yourself to reinvent characters as they reinvent you to be bold and to be willing to play seemingly unlikeable people.

data.quote: My dad was always interested in characters he didn't understand - he was such a great bad guy in movies. And that is really the thing that calls me to the material often: something I struggle to understand in human behaviour.
data.author: Laura Dern

data.quote: To stay true to your art is such a complicated journey, and Dad clearly has done it.
data.author: Laura Dern

data.quote: I remember my dad working with me on breaking down my script and writing out a back story for my character and all that stuff.
data.author: Jason Bateman

data.author: Jason Bateman

data.quote: You, Dad, in the large scheme of things, don't matter. I, Dad, don't matter. We're vectors on the grids of cellular life.
data.author: David Shields

data.quote: I've always loved video games. I played 'Ms. Pac-man' with my dad, and I Ioved 'Galaga' and 'Tempest' and grew up on the standing arcade games. Even to this day, my dad will call me if he's playing 'Ms. Pac-man' and hold the phone up to the game.

data.quote: My dad, he was a construction worker. He was a butcher. He was a deep sea fisherman.
data.author: Aisha Tyler

data.quote: I was raised by a single dad, and I've always kind of liked things that are typically more guy-oriented.
data.author: Aisha Tyler

data.author: Aisha Tyler

data.quote: My dad was a big Frank Zappa fan, so I remember listening to a lot of Frank Zappa. Girls do not like Frank Zappa.

data.quote: I think it was hard at first for my dad to transition to being immobile.
data.author: Jeb Bush

data.quote: I remember in the fifth grade my dad would take me to Manhattan to shop for clothes.
data.author: Theophilus London

data.quote: The first time I went to New York, I went with my first boyfriend, Clark. His dad had just bought an apartment in New York, and my dad dropped us off, and we were there for a week on our own. I must have been 15 or 16. I remember I went to Harlem and bought a goose jacket. That was the hip, hot thing.
data.author: Kate Moss

data.quote: My dad had a Vincent Black Shadow, which was a quite particular thing: it was the fastest cycle of its era... It sparked a world for me; when I was old enough, I got a motorcycle.

data.quote: I have my dad's shape. No booty.

data.quote: All that really matters is I have two beautiful kids, and I'm trying to be the best dad I can possibly be, and that's the most important thing of all.
data.author: Tiger Woods

data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: Overcoming my dad telling me that I could never amount to anything is what has made me the megalomaniac that you see today.
data.author: Bono

data.quote: I'm more comfortable with whatever's wrong with me than my father was whenever he felt he failed or didn't measure up to the standard he set.
data.author: John Malkovich

data.author: Priyanka Chopra

data.quote: My dad had a lot of bad luck. You could see his suffering, his terrible suffering, living a life that was disappointing and looking for another one.
data.author: Sam Shepard

data.quote: My old man tried to force on me a notion of what it was to be a 'man.' And it destroyed my dad.
data.author: Sam Shepard

data.quote: People have told me, 'My dad passed on, but I have great memories of watching your shows with him.' It doesn't get any better than that.
data.author: Bob Newhart

data.quote: My dad died of a heart attack when I was 15. I was bullied mercilessly in middle school. I went through a divorce - those not-so-great things are all a part of me, and they give me a place to go when I cover those stories on the news. I'm more empathetic, more relatable because of them.
data.author: Megyn Kelly

data.quote: My dad always said that hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard enough.
data.author: Katee Sackhoff

data.quote: I didn't start sweating until I had children. That was one of the first things I realized when my daughter Violet was born - I started getting wicked BO. You know there's a difference between basketball BO and stress BO? This was definitely stress BO. Like, new dad BO.
data.author: Dave Grohl

data.quote: My mother taught me what it is to have a sense of humour; my dad, who was a headmaster, everything you need to know about hard work. My dad is the most decent man you could come across.

data.quote: I grew up upper-class. Private school. My dad had a Jaguar. We're African-American, and we work together as a family, so people assume we're like the Jacksons. But I didn't have parents using me to get out of a bad situation.
data.author: Beyonce Knowles

data.quote: My dad was in the Second World War with General Patton. He won medals for bravery, but he came home quite damaged, so he was a handful. He told us some terrible stories, and I guess you'd say he suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder.
data.author: Jerry Hall

data.quote: My dad designed houses and was an architect for many years.
data.author: Nikki Reed

data.quote: My dad was the way he was, but he also gave me a motto: never say die. Just to keep pushing and pushing, fighting until the end. He put it in my head that you're always going to fight, and you're always going to beat them.
data.author: Jason Day

data.quote: My dad was a violent alcoholic. Really aggressive.
data.author: Jason Day

data.quote: When you lose someone whose life was so extraordinary like my dad's, you have two options: You can curl up in a dark corner... or rise above it and dust yourself off and continue with their work. He will always be with me.

data.quote: I'm concerned a little bit with the culture of celebrating the fundraise. My dad taught me that when you borrow money it's the worst day of your life.
data.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

data.quote: When I was three years old, my dad bought me my first drum set.
data.author: Travis Scott

data.quote: There is too much fathering going on just now and there is no doubt about it fathers are depressing.
data.author: Gertrude Stein

data.quote: My grandfather and my uncle both died from colorectal cancer, my dad almost died from it and I have the gene for it.
data.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

data.quote: I am very close to my brother Ramesh Babu. When my father was away for shootings, my brother would take care of me, and I am very close to him, and yes, Dad's always special. He used to call me and enquire about my film's progress. Whenever I deliver a hit, I can see a glow on my father's face.
data.author: Mahesh Babu

data.quote: My dad was a labour lawyer, and the ideas that I grew up with - bad management, bad capitalism, robber barons - when I applied this to my own life, I saw that we are all on both sides of the coin.
data.author: David Mamet

data.quote: My dad was an immigrant kid and a Democrat and a Jew, and we didn't know any Republicans in our group. So I grew up Democratic. My dad was a labor lawyer - a very hardworking guy, a one-horse labor lawyer - and then I went to hippie college and lived in the bubble.
data.author: David Mamet

data.quote: I was raised by free-spirited people, though my father gave me a very strong work ethic.
data.author: Diane Lane

data.quote: My greatest dream is to work with my dad someday as an actress.
data.author: Bryce Dallas Howard

data.quote: My dad made a film called 'Willow' when he was a young filmmaker, which screened at the Cannes film festival, and people were booing afterwards.
data.author: Bryce Dallas Howard

data.quote: I don't think my kids have to worry too much about me embarrassing them because that's not how I would want to grow up, with wacky dad showing up at school and performing for everyone.
data.author: Steve Carell

data.quote: My father was grounded, a very meat-and-potatoes man. He was a baker.
data.author: Anthony Hopkins

data.quote: My life is black and white and mixed. My mother's a Rastafarian, my dad was a short white guy - it's not an affectation. It's also the lives of millions of people throughout the world.
data.author: Zadie Smith

data.quote: I still love recording and still love the stage, but like my dad, I have the most fun when I am in front of that glorious orchestra or that kick-butt big band.
data.author: Natalie Cole

data.quote: My dad cut my hair once - I wanted a bob and he gave me a bowl cut. That was a tough few years.
data.author: Alexa Chung

data.quote: My dad has kind of been the standard for me, he played 16 years in the league, and since I've been in the league, every year that I go through and deal with the scratches, the bumps and bruises, just the grind that it is to go through one NBA season.
data.author: Stephen Curry

data.quote: But I have to be careful not to let the world dazzle me so much that I forget that I'm a husband and a father.
data.author: Herbie Hancock

data.quote: I don't think I can boast about him. 'Hey, my dad is a British institution; he's done all these incredible things and I'm really proud of him.' There is a certain baggage that comes with that in England.
data.author: Rebecca Hall

data.quote: Everybody wanna be a super dad and the best dad ever, but sometimes, I'm just realizing that I'm not perfect.
data.author: Future

data.quote: My mum is really fair and has blonde hair, and my dad is not dark, either.
data.author: Amy Jackson

data.quote: Mum and Dad met campaigning on the Spanish civil war. Both were active peace campaigners. They died in 1986 and '87.
data.author: Jeremy Corbyn

data.quote: My dad takes care of me as a manager and as a dad. That's his job, you know, to take care of me. He has my best interests at heart.
data.author: Jessica Simpson

data.quote: I went to see England against Switzerland at Wembley with my dad and brother, too. That was in 2008, Fabio Capello's first game in charge. Jermaine Jenas scored, and we won 2-1. I remember the national anthem was incredible. I sang it with pride - always do.
data.author: Harry Kane

data.quote: My dad was a truck driver, and from the time I was knee high to a grapevine, I was driving a truck.
data.author: Johnny Van Zant

data.quote: My dad was a truck driver. We all used to ride along with him. And the way he'd keep awake was to sing while he was going down the road. So we all joined in.
data.author: Johnny Van Zant

data.quote: I grew up in Birmingham, but my parents are originally from Barbados. My dad, Romeo, was a long-distance lorry driver, and my mother, Mayleen, worked in catering.
data.author: David Harewood

data.quote: My dad turned me onto Peter Sellers as a kid. I loved the fact that he was a unique combination of being extremely subtle and over-the-top all at the same time, and that's a hard thing to do. I admire that.
data.author: Will Ferrell

data.quote: My dad got me a huge board when I was little. He loves to surf. He suited me up and sent me out on this huge wave. I went under, and when I came out and the board hit me in the face. So I said, I never wanted to do this again. I stayed away until I was 13.
data.author: Shaun White

data.quote: People say, 'You will be 30 years old; you're too old. You'll get your nose broke,' say dad's a pushy dad. You hear stupid things and put them out of your mind.
data.author: Katie Taylor

data.quote: My dad's one true quest in life was for the Platonic ideal of peanut butter. And I remember one day he announced, with a look of utter transfiguration on his face, that he had found paradise on Earth in a jar with a yellow cap. And it was called Red Wing.
data.author: Christopher Buckley

data.quote: My dad was a pastor, so we were in church all the time.
data.author: Ben Zobrist

data.quote: I remember taking my stabilisers off my bike with my dad in the back garden. It was a small little bike, and it was called Poppy, had balloons on it, and was purple.
data.author: Lizzie Armitstead

data.quote: Where I come from, you don't really talk about how much you're earning. Those things are private. My dad never told my mum how much he was earning. I'm certainly not going to tell the world. I'm doing well.
data.author: Paul McCartney

data.quote: My dad was a particularly polite kind of guy, very courteous.
data.author: Paul McCartney

data.quote: When I first joined SAG, there was another John Reilly. My dad was John Reilly, too, but growing up I was John John. Nobody in life calls me John C. It's more like, 'Hey you, Step Brother!'
data.author: John C. Reilly

data.quote: I think I got into travelling because it was so not in my blood, so against my tendency to just stay put because my dad just hated going on holidays, because, as I've said in many essays, the thing that he hated more than anything else in life was spending money. And as soon as you leave your home, you're spending money.
data.author: Geoff Dyer

data.quote: In Brazil, if you have a son, the first thing you give him is a football. That's the first gift - so my dad was no different.
data.author: Diego Costa

data.quote: It's weird, the idea of someone else playing my dad, but weirdly nice.
data.author: Lily James
